title: NBK Mobile Banking
summary: Download the App today and conduct your transactions easily around the clock.
description: NBK’s mobile banking application allows you to manage your account through your device. The application is available in Arabic and EnglishIt is a safe, convenient, and practical way to undertake all your banking needs with a simply user-friendly interface.Some of the benefits of the app include:•	Real-Time balance and transactions updates made on your account•	The ability to view the full history of transactions made on your accounts and credit cards•	Transfer funds between your accounts or other NBK customer’s accounts•	Transfer funds locally or internationally•	Ability to transfer money from your credit card to your account (Cash advance)•	Make instant payments to your credit cards•	Pay your mobile and telephone bills with a touch of a button•	Request printed account statements and checkbooks•	Adding Cash Deposit Machine (CDM) and promotion locators•	View participating outlets•	Display FAQs •	Locate your nearest NBK branch or ATM in Kuwait•	Contact NBK through Call Center and Social Media Channels•	Locate branches and ATMs through the Augmented Reality camera in the app•	Travel tips•	Al Jawhara, Loan, and Term Deposit calculators•	View the exchange rate•	Create pre-paid cards with different currencies: in US Dollars, Great Britain Pound, EURO, UAE Dirhams, Egyptian Pound, Indian Rupees, Jordanian Dinar, and Saudi Riyal And much moreThe application is simple, safe, and easy to use.Download the application today and manage your finance at your own convenience.For any support issues, please contact NBK Call Center on 1801801 or via What’s App 52221333 and ask for help! Our trained agents will be more than happy to assist you anytime around the clock.
descriptionHTML:
NBK’s mobile banking application allows you to manage your account through your device. The application is available in Arabic and English

It is a safe, convenient, and practical way to undertake all your banking needs with a simply user-friendly interface.

Some of the benefits of the app include:
• Real-Time balance and transactions updates made on your account
• The ability to view the full history of transactions made on your accounts and credit cards
• Transfer funds between your accounts or other NBK customer’s accounts
• Transfer funds locally or internationally
• Ability to transfer money from your credit card to your account (Cash advance)
• Make instant payments to your credit cards
• Pay your mobile and telephone bills with a touch of a button
• Request printed account statements and checkbooks
• Adding Cash Deposit Machine (CDM) and promotion locators
• View participating outlets
• Display FAQs
• Locate your nearest NBK branch or ATM in Kuwait
• Contact NBK through Call Center and Social Media Channels
• Locate branches and ATMs through the Augmented Reality camera in the app
• Travel tips
• Al Jawhara, Loan, and Term Deposit calculators
• View the exchange rate
• Create pre-paid cards with different currencies: in US Dollars, Great Britain Pound, EURO, UAE Dirhams, Egyptian Pound, Indian Rupees, Jordanian Dinar, and Saudi Riyal
And much more

The application is simple, safe, and easy to use.

Download the application today and manage your finance at your own convenience.

For any support issues, please contact NBK Call Center on 1801801 or via What’s App 52221333 and ask for help! Our trained agents will be more than happy to assist you anytime around the clock.
comments: I think Nbk needs to provide a better service and financial operation to its customers which are unhappy with this so called mobile app. 1. Fingerprint accessibility should be provided for the customer at any cost. And please don't tell us (your customers that iPhone is more secure than android OS because that's a lame excuse. That for the customer to choose and the developer to provide.  2. Nbk should provide local and international  beneficiaries add on for us. Its poor financial operation service that other banks in the GCC are providing those service. Nbk you should be providing better services for your customer isn't that part of your culture.

Needs finger print unlock. I can decide myself if it's secure enough for me..  Also, being able to add a new beneficiary directly from the app would be useful. I had to login to nbk online via my web browser to do something that should be offered on the app.
تحديث جيد ولكن ينقصة بعض الإضافات مثل الدخول السريع على الحساب فادخال كلمة السر كل مرة مزعج جدا ؛ وذلك عن طريق البصمة مثل معظم التطبيقات البنكية والربط مع الساعات الذكية أسوة بنظام الايفون
I can't believe that we still have to type our passwords like savages, what is this 2014!
Need to add fingerprint or iris login like all the other banks
يعني بنك شكبره شعرضه  وتحديثكمالاخير تعبان متى بتسوونه بالله
recentChanges: •	Account opening through Mobile Application (Current, Saving, Super, Trust, and Al Jawhara) in Kuwaiti Dinar and other currencies (American Dollars, Great Britain Sterling Pounds, Euro, and  Japanese Yen)
•	Apply for foreign currency prepaid cards
